## getNumberFormatLocales() function

Add [numbering-system tags](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Intl#Locale_identification_and_negotiation) to locale identifiers

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getNumberFormatLocales(locales: string | string[], { numberingSystem }: Skeleton): string[];
```
